author: Woo Bih Li J:
casename: Jurong Port Pte Ltd v Huationg Inland Transport Service Pte Ltd
counsel: Loo Dip Seng and Leong Lu Yuan (Ang & Partners) for the plaintiff; Patrick Chin (Chin Patrick & Co) for the defendant
tags-parsed: Contract/Contractual terms/Indemnity clauses/Plaintiff and defendant agreeing to construction contract/Plaintiff alleging defendant agreed to indemnify plaintiff from liability arising from negligence by plaintiff's employees pursuant to certain clauses in contract/Whether clauses were clear enough to require defendant to indemnify plaintiff for liability arising from negligence by plaintiff's own employee
